basics.label: Production Supervisor / Value Stream Leader
basics.summary: To obtain employment within your company with an opportunity for growth and advancement.

highlights: Improve efficiency and productivity by eliminating waste and production constraints.

work.name: Unknown

work.name: Unknown
work.summary: Job duties include building of several types of air compressors from single-stage to two-stage compressors. Troubleshooting and correcting any problems that may arise during assembly...

work.summary: Preformed maintenance on the S-3B Viking aircraft...
